posts.post_title: FS T205 Christy Mathewson SGC 3 new label. SOLD
posts.post_content: T-205 Christy Mathewson SGC 3.  It is bright, and very precise picture registration as this card tends to be dark/dull and have registration issues, which can really mess with his eyes.  This one is bright and super clear. No hard surface breaking creases and super clean back. PayPal FF preferred.  References if needed. [url]Stottlemire800@gmail.com[/url] SOLD
